title: Fatal error: Uncaught InvalidArgumentException: Could not get class storage for runtimeexception
body:
I tried for the first time psalm on one of my zf2 project.
when I run psalm, I have this error

```
Fatal error: Uncaught InvalidArgumentException: Could not get class storage for runtimeexception in vendor\vimeo\psalm\src\Psalm\Internal\Provider\ClassLikeStorageProvider.php:46
Stack trace:
#0 vendor\vimeo\psalm\src\Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\ClassLikeAnalyzer.php(312): Psalm\Internal\Provider\ClassLikeStorageProvider->get('runtimeexceptio...')
#1 vendor\vimeo\psalm\src\Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\Statements\Expression\Call\NewAnalyzer.php(278): Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\ClassLikeAnalyzer::checkFullyQualifiedClassLikeName(Object(Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\StatementsAnalyzer), 'RuntimeExceptio...', Object(Psalm\CodeLocation), Array, false)
#2 vendor\vimeo\psalm\src\Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\Statements\ExpressionAnalyzer.php(377): Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\Statements\Expression\Call\NewAnalyzer::analyze(Object(Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\StatementsAnalyzer), Object(PhpParser\Node\Expr\New_), Object(Psalm\Context))
#3 vendor\vimeo\psalm\src\Psalm\In in D:\www\melliol\hoa\vendor\vimeo\psalm\src\Psalm\Internal\Provider\ClassLikeStorageProvider.php on line 46
```

this runtimeexception is located in [public/index.php line 25](https://github.com/zendframework/ZendSkeletonApplication/blob/master/public/index.php#L25) from the zf skeleton app

if I remove the line, psalm run without fatal error. Looks strange as RunTimeException seems to be a valid php exception.

I am using php 7.1.26 with the latest version of psalm

regards
